s.text: "In the circumstances, it is perhaps best for Jakarta to wait for the economic and political situation to stabilize before taking a decision on a referendum."
Following the death of the last whale at Hong Kong's Ocean Park, the South China Morning Post called Friday for an end to using marine mammals for popular entertainment.
In an editorial, the Straits Times of Singapore dwelt Friday on the threat of further secessions from Indonesia following the independence of East Timor.
